description:
When Lee notices the middle character on Gaara`s forehead has changed from “Love” to “Romance,” he`s convinced the Kazekage`s got a crush on someone and sets out to learn their identity.  Lee gets a booby-trapped watch from Orochimaru that will explode if he stops training.  Or if Neji cross-dresses.  Or Tenten overreacts.  How will Lee survive?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaara`s First Date! / A Gift from Orochimaru
我愛羅くんの胸キュン☆初恋デートです / 大蛇丸からのプレゼントです
